attributes.action: add the British military identity card to the list of recognised documents that can be provided as proof of identity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, the military identtiy card is not recognised by financial institutions as a valid form of identity. Whereas, a paper driving licence is accepted.  I believe it is a insult to British Servicemen and Women that their membership of the Armed Forces and the identity card they carry is not recognised as a valid form of identification in their own country.
